body.p:
Fundraising and donation options allow organizations to:
Access staff communication with prospects and donors
Acquire insight into donor history to better target campaigns
Capture and display donation giving via Campaign Pages
Identify and maximize giving opportunities
Nurture key donor prospects
Track source codes by individual campaigns

Staff users have dozens of presentation options for fundraising campaigns, providing organizations with the ideal format to communicate with their donors, diversify giving channels, and increase engagement levels.
